articles.description: On one of the biggest day for music fans across the UK, huge queues have been spotted outside Edinburgh record stores since the crack of dawn to mark National Record Store Day
articles.content:
Huge queues have been spotted at record stores around Edinburgh today for National Record Store Day.
The city is filled with a handful of popular record stores, some of which will be selling rare co… [+2543 chars]

articles.title: Martin Roberts says doctors still worried after huge needle put into chest - Wales Online
articles.description: The Homes Under The Hammer star has described his frightening treatment and says his liver is 'still struggling'
articles.content: Martin Roberts has opened about his terrifying health scare and the moment he watched doctors plunge an 'eight inch needle' into his chest in a race to save his life. The Homes Under The Hammer star,… [+1766 chars]

articles.title: 'What snubbing looks like!' Prince Harry shakes hands with Dutch King at Invictus meeting - Express
articles.description: PRINCE HARRY met the sovereign of The Netherlands, King Willem-Alexander, on the final day of the Invictus Games.

articles.title: The Corn is Green, review: Nicola Walker is unmissable in this riveting production - The Telegraph
articles.description: The National Theatre’s revival of Emlyn Williams’s 1938 play is crowned by the Unforgotten star’s finely calibrated performance
